Question
========

![](uva-independent-samples-means-493-nl-graph01.png)

----------

* 106.87
* 115.83
* 117.33
* 130.87

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 106.87: Incorrect
* 115.83: Correct
* 117.33: Incorrect
* 130.87: Incorrect
